'''Official Trailer - Minecraft Xbox 360 Edition''' is the official trailer for ''[[Legacy Console Edition|Minecraft]]'' [[Xbox 360 Edition]].

== Summary ==
Wielding a [[Stone Pickaxe|stone pickaxe]], a [[player]] looks over the [[Overworld]]. Suddenly, several more players begin to join the game, spawning right behind the viewer in a [[dirt]] castle. The players split off, demonstrating [[splitscreen]], frolicking through [[plains]], digging for [[Coal Ore|coal]], hunting mobs, and building a [[Planks|wooden]] house. The screen changes to four player splitscreen, all crafting different items.

The trailer then returns to the castle, which appear to be in a shouting match with a similar mound across from it. Apparently, they engage in combat over [[Wooden Slab|bridges]], one player clearing a [[Cobblestone|blockade]]. Eight player splitscreen is then show on a block, with the promise of "8 friends, on {{w|Xbox Live}}!" More players dig in a [[cave]], one obtaining [[Diamond|diamonds]], before another opens a [[nether portal]]. The adventure continues in the [[The Nether|Nether]], one player burning to death. They are then shown building together in the Overworld, doing various activities.
